website_summaries.verdict: If you love to snorkel, you'll appreciate this set's features that include a superior mask with a patent-pending tube.
pros: Offers a panoramic view mask with full-face coverage
Flowtech breathing system is comfortable and easy to use
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the scale, but the quality is top-notch

customer_reviews.title: Best fit I ever had
customer_reviews.text: When they say that this is custom designed to fit your face better than any other product, they are not lying! For someone who has gone through so much snorkeling gear over the years this is by far the best one I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, fogs up and can cause nausea and headache. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to using this when we went snorkeling in Belize last Tuesday. Very disappointed that this fogged up quite badly, as well as leaks water from my forehead! I have adjusted the mask several times yet it still continued to leak. I also felt light headed and nauseated a few minutes after using it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: catlover101

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: The mask absolutely hurts to wear, dug into my forehead and fogs within seconds. I followed the instructions and washed with baby shampoo 5x. This mask also tended to leak. I would like my money back please.
customer_reviews.author: Gsuhr

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these for my wife and my sister purchased another one. Both of their masks leaked and no matter how we tried, both masks leaked. We had another passenger on the trip try and still leaked. Two masks purchased at two different times both had the same result on multiple people. Your mileage may vary, but for us this is a poorly designed mask. We tried 'the original' mask and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Over Engineered- Foggy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used full face snorkel masks in the past, and they work great; however, this one suffers from over engineering... Curvature of the seal that separates your nose and mouth from your eyes has a very specific shape, and did not work to block exhaled air for me nor my fiancé, causing it to fog instantaneously. The design looks pretty cool, so we were excited for that, but the execution just isn’t there- would expect more for so much money relative to the cost of the other masks.
customer_reviews.author: VAstudent

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel release button broke on first use...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this mask. It looks super cool, and has a nice design. It does indeed have more airflow than traditional masks...however, the snorkel release button broke on the first use. I'm not sure if it's a defect or what, but I pushed it in and heard a snap. For spending this kind of money, I would expect better quality. The valve on the snorkel was a bit finicky as well. It tended to cut off the air supply when breathing even moderately heavy. Like many other model masks, this one also has the problem with the shutoff valve sticking. By briefly exhaling it corrects itself, but again, at this price point I would expect better.
customer_reviews.author: DeKalb Land Man

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: Some serious design work went into this mask with the customer in mind. Complete with mask, detachable snorkel for easier transport, GoPro attachment, message bottom bag to carry and dry off.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this mask for most people.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews it led me to try this mask. However, once I received it, I realized that a full face mask was asking a lot. With masks the seal is the most important thing. You must have the exact face size to fit this mask in order to possibly enjoy it. I immediately felt the CO2 when just trying on the mask and breathing. I started getting a headache and could see that it would never work out. My advice would be to consider that your face must fit exactly for this to potentially work for you. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: In the small size, it leaks like a sieve.
customer_reviews.text: After comparing the mask with the larger size that my husband bought, the only noticeable difference was a slightly larger face seal around the chin area. The forehead was the same as the large, hence all the water leakage. I contacted the manufacturer for a possible solution since we were past the return date. I got no response. The price for the mask coupled with the hard carrying case makes this purchase a total bust.
customer_reviews.author: D. Love

customer_reviews.title: Breathing is simple! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mask to take with me to Hawaii in a few weeks. I took it to the local pool to practice since the breathing is different than a standard snorkel mask. Within a few minutes, I was using the mask like a pro. Being able to breathe as I normally would is one of the best things about this mask. The adjustment is simple. The fit is perfect and the view is amazing! I can't wait to use it in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: S.B. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner snorkel experience
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to have when a friend comes along that hasn’t snorkeled before. The mask is very comfortable and I have found the medium to be watertight on all that have tried it so far. I could see the small being great for a child or tween wanting to try snorkeling. Traditional masks can cause one to panic and seem to take on water easier, I was impressed with how user friendly and safe feeling the mask is. Would definitely recommend Wildhorn, they have awesome products one of my favorites being the beach towel... which pairs perfect with this snorkel ;)
customer_reviews.author: DrExploreMore

customer_reviews.title: Best Full Face Mask Out There
customer_reviews.text: We really love full face snorkel masks. The V2 from Wildhorn is so much easier to breath with than other versions. It takes some getting used to, with any full face masks, to get the fit right sometimes so there's no leaking. Tips include: don't over tighten, don't have lotion on your face, use a little vaseline if there are small leaks. It's the best way to go though because you can breath normally and still talk under water. Love it!! Customer service with Wildhorn is amazing. We own so many of these masks and they are always quick to respond and assist.
customer_reviews.author: o2b4ft11

customer_reviews.title: Pick this one! Don't waste time and money on others!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time, did a ton of research, read dozens of reviews, and am thrilled with my choice. The thing that pushed me past skepticism was the video done by the company. I hyperventilate easily, so the separate breathing compartments were essential. The mask was comfortable, fit well, was easy to put together and worked exactly as indicated. Not disappointed in anything. My first snorkel on my cruise was planned. The guides were impressed. The second snorkel opportunity was unexpected and I hadn't brought my Seaview 180°. What a massive difference to go back to a normal mask and snorkel after having used the Seaview! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! Great job, WildHorn!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy IM

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great mask
customer_reviews.text: It was hard for me to rate this mask because it didn't fit me properly. Generally, it looks like a great mask -- good visibility and so on. According to the sizing guide, this should fit me; however, there are no guidelines for the WIDTH of the mask. I have a narrow face and this mask is too wide for my face. I didn't test it in water because just putting it on and looking in the mirror provided all the proof that I needed that it won't work for me. There are visible gaps. I think that it would be helpful if the sizing guideline provided measurements for the width of the face.
customer_reviews.author: Henry's Mom

customer_reviews.title: CO2 builds up, can’t breath for more than a minute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a dangerous product. It feels fine in the beginning, but after a minute of wearing it CO2 build up and you need to take it off for a breath of fresh air. Given that it doesn’t have quick release button it is tricky to take it off as the straps have to be pretty tight or the water gets in. And if you are snorkeling at the depth it’s just dangerous. It ruined my snorkeling trip. You can test it in shallow water and it might appear fine but for snorkeling trips off the boat don’t use it. On a positive side, it doesn’t not fog in as much a regular snorkeling mask.
customer_reviews.author: NewYork Mom

customer_reviews.title: good for surface snorkling
customer_reviews.text: likes, good clear field of vision, ease of breathing, easy to put on and take off. Cons, cannot equalize pressure when attempting to dive below surface, exerts painful pressure on the face and sinus when you attempt to dive. also the snorkel valve tended to stick closed upon surfacing preventing clearing the snorkel and taking a breath. This is great if you only intend to surface snorkel, but not for diving down to take a closer look at anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately if you're doing a snorkel tour you will not be able to use this mask. This mask has caused people to pass out during use as I was told from the owner of the boat in Maui due to heavy breathing and carbon dioxide not being evacuated fast enough. We had to use theirs at free of charge. So now I own 3 snorkel masks I never used and probably never will as well as out almost $300 now. Beware of use with this product and check your tour boat rules before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Delte

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! We have logged 6 dives in tropical waters with this mask. Superb viewing and it is so nice to just float around breathing through your nose. As a rookie in the ocean, I took 5 minutes to get used to it, and just love it. Googles are compact, and you jump off a boat with googles on, but this is a better experience IMO. Use baby shampoo for antifog, a clean microfiber cloth is a must, take measures to avoid scratches (like sand in the carry bag or using a gritty beach towel) and enjoy! I even got mine in red, hers in blue to match our fins.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this! We took a trip to snorkel. The rest of the family used regular masks and snorkels and by far, his was the best and easiest. No trouble with it at all. Very comfortable and easy to use. When we "rented" our masks and snorkels, it was $68 for the week for each person (it did include fins and a boogie board each), but the $90 was worth it to have your own and the ease of its use.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Bad Chemical Smell and Stopper Gets Stuck
customer_reviews.text: This particular mask had a strong chemical smell that made it very difficult to breathe. I thought it would air out but it wasn't happening. Also, the ball stopper (blocks water if your snorkel goes under water) would stay stuck in the underwater diving position blocking all air until I would physically tap it down which could cause a lot of panic of you're prone. I purchased a different brand and I have no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Goeller

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️ The BEST full face snorkel mask EVER!!! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this full face snorkel mask I had the best vacations in Costa Rica with my family ever!!! My wife and I tried in a pool first, it was an awesome experience. It works well, is comfortable to wear and easy to adjust. You don't have to bite down on anything, no water leaks at all! This full-face snorkel mask is way better than any traditional snorkel mask and my wife used it all the time and didn't let me use it much! I guess I am buying another one, LOL! Funny enough I saw a few other people wearing exactly the same mask in our resort.
customer_reviews.author: Begemot

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very well-made and the field of vision is outstanding. When put on correctly, it is comfortable to wear. However, using it to breathe is problematic: the manufacturer warns that it is not to be used for swimming or any exertion, and that is an understatement. The carbon dioxide build-up happens quickly even if the user is snorkeling gently in calm seas. It is worrisome how quickly a swimmer can get breathless. I am an advanced scuba diver and a strong swimmer with a good aerobic capacity, and I could not use this mask safely under normal ocean conditions. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a thousand times easier to breathe in than a traditional mask and snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these during Wildhorns kickstarter campaign. It worked so well that I ordered this second one for my friend. I’ve always struggled breathing comfortably in a traditional mask. This full face coverage is a no brainer. Once I figured out the basics of the valve, this is a thousand times better and so easy to breath!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L.

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure of It Keeping Us Safe/Alive
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the wifey for an upcoming trip she wasn't cool with the fact that people have died while using it. She bought her own standard snorkel and mask set. This thing isn't even going with us on our trip! It is comfortable and seemingly easy to use out of the water. Just haven't actually used it under water for the afore mentioned reason! Should have researched this more before getting caught up in the novelty of the idea this offers. If some one wants to buy it from me, make an offer.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan C. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I expected a little better for the price
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would breathe a little easier and fog a little less for the price compared to the competition, but maybe they are worse. This is definitely for casual use with the occasional dive. If you exert yourself, pull it off and breathe some fresh air. If you get the right size you won't get much water seeping in and you won't suck in water when you go under. I think you probably inhale a little of your own CO2, so I wouldn't use it long.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, the view is amazing and it's easy to fit and use. It is different than an older style mask and snorkel and I can see that some people would panic when using it because the air tube shuts off when submerged making you feel air hungry immediately but you have to learn to just raise your head and let the air flow again. I love that I'm not accidentally gulping sea water when using it and it works very well for me. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snorkel for an upcoming trip to the Caribbean, but I tried it out at the pool to make sure it’s a keeper. It’s awesome! I loved that I was able to breath normally. The visibility was amazing. I also really liked the color and it’s sturdy plastic with thick straps. A little water leaked through the top until I got the seal right, though. I was on the border between medium and large. I got the medium and it’s a perfect fit. I have another fancy dive shop snorkel that now I’ll keep judt for scuba or as a second. The Seaview 180 is just perfect. I can’t wait to try it in the ocean!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Green

customer_reviews.title: Why do they even make traditional masks anymore?
customer_reviews.text: Took to Mexico where it was a bit wavy and never inhaled water. No gross sharing of mouthpiece. Fit me great (did not fit my kids at all - buying a smaller size is needed for a smaller face). No jaw muscle tightness and better air inflow than a traditional snorkel. Wish this was made decades ago as it really is a much improved snorkeling experience. Old traditional gear is like using a wooden cart instead of a pickup truck after you use this.
customer_reviews.author: G. Porat

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable full face snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in anticipation of a caribbean cruise. Had my wife try it on and size it up in the lake while the weather was still warm. She can't snorkel. Whether it's the seal of a standard mask and the feel of the snorkel in her mouth, i don't know. She can't snorkel. She snorkeled several times on our trip. keeping the mask on for fifteen to twenty minutes at a time. No Leaks. comfortable to wear. great viewing area. This is a highly rated full face snorkel and i'm glad I purchased it. Happy wife. Happy Life!!
customer_reviews.author: campinnh

customer_reviews.title: Streamlines snorkeling experience
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always enjoyed snorkeling, but the separate mask and snorkel have always felt a bit clumsy, not to mention most mask designs limit your field of view (I’ve had a few things sneak up on me, and startle me as they pass by). The Seaview 180 resolves these problems. It is streamlined, it fits well, allows a wide view, there’s no mask/snorkel fumbling, the breathing is much easier, and I haven’t had any fogging issues. This is snorkeling simplified, and it makes the entire snorkeling experience much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect but not usable
customer_reviews.text: This thing was the best full face mask I had ever used until I dipped down underwater. Water leaks in to the mask from the breathing tube on the right before the ball stops it. The water drips out as soon as the mask comes out of the water, but it is HIGHLY annoying. Not diving underwater, just dipping your head down bring water in. I returned it because of this reason, would buy again if the fixed that flaw with the "horn" design.
customer_reviews.author: ekene e.

customer_reviews.title: Top top top quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to use on my recent trip to Costa Rica and wasn't disappointed. Loved the product, you can tell it's super amazing quality just from when you take it out of the box and made in USA which I like too. Last trip to Mauritius (best snorkeling ever!!) I bought an awful Chinese snorkeling mask, and it broke the first day and i had to use the awful one from the guide on the boat. Was much much happier this time!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Cobid-19 protection!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for Cobid-19 protection! I feel much safer with it on especially when others are NOT Wearing a mask!! I bought a HEPA furnace filter and cut it to fit over the air inlet and outlet holding the filter fabric in place with rubber bands. I think that it will be worth it in the long run, as we should most likely have to wear a mask to protect ourselves and others for sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Loebrich

customer_reviews.title: Fogged
customer_reviews.text: Fogged up almost immediately. Could not see the entire time. Had the right size, just the design blows the rebreathed air right up the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: The SeaView V2 is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of being able to breathe normally. I've tried the old style masks with the snorkel in the middle and they don't work as well. This one stays out of the water much better and allows me to snorkel comfortably for hours! It's easy to assemble or disassemble to store in the convenient bag that is included! I would recommend this to anyone that likes to snorkel and hates breathing through their mouth in the old style snorkel. This is the way of the future!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea H. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Functioned perfectly from the start
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a recovering back injury patient with no snorkeling experience whose physiatrist advised that swimming would be the best aerobic exercise to begin with, but only with a snorkel to avoid the normal head-turning breathing. Perfectly tight fit with easy adjustments meant an instant and successful introduction to swimming with a snorkel. It functioned perfectly from the start because it was effectively designed to avoid common snorkeling problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I just used it for the first time. Being a scuba diver, and being used to having my mouth exposed, I was a little skeptical about the comfort. For snorkeling, it is amazing. I think it is more much more comforting, especially for a beginner, to have their mouth enclosed in the mask. The mask had a great seal and was very comfortable. Quality of mask is very high as well and comes with a protective bag.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Great seal, even with my beard. Excellent visibility. Effortless breathing. No condensation. Solid construction and nice carry bag. Camera mount location is better than the forehead mounts. Superior to all of the others I saw and it was the envy of fellow snorkelers including professional snorkel guides. It is only good for use on the surface . You need an old style system for diving The mask's bouyancy prevents you from getting much below the surface
customer_reviews.author: patrick belliveau

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Do not waste money on this terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Mask is a total piece of crap. It gets tighter on your face with each breath, yet still manages to leak copious amounts of water. It feels like a vice on your head and tries to drown you at the same time, and this is all while swimming on the surface. Side mounted snorkle does not work for swimming, one side goes under water with every other stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Welby

customer_reviews.title: Made snorkeling even easier! No need to clear when diving.
customer_reviews.text: Tried out for the first time snorkeling with the seals at La Jolla. It was nice to have great vision as the seals are large and intimidating. So easy to use and when diving down there was no need to clear out the snorkel like with regular snorkels and masks. Would confidently recommend to anyone! Just order the correct size for your face!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn L.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is. Hard to breath
customer_reviews.text: Meh it was okay. Kinda hard to breath and heavy. Awkward to pack when travelling and it seems that some of the one way valves aren't too great. Also, based on the sizing chart, the one I purchased was supposed to be correct for my facial dimensions, but it was kinda loose and I always needed to tighten the straps bc they kept loosening when using. Either way I was able to use the camera mount and have some nice dives. The price is way too expensive. Should be like $30 tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fog up. Doesn’t hurt your face. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Received this tonight. I just came back from the pool and tested it extensively- it’s absolutely perfect, gives you 180 view and helps objects appear CLOSER than they actually are so that in Destin Florida in that colorful gulf water you can see those turtles 🐢 and fish 🐠 very closely. Doesn’t fog up. Doesn’t hurt your face. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaSzabo.com

customer_reviews.title: Full beard and no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beard and these still did not leak! Amazing job SeaView. I will definitely recommend and buy again. NOTE: Between V1 and the V2 their water locking ball is more sensitive so if you feel like you cannot breathe just tilt your head down some.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel....Prevents water from getting in if you go under
customer_reviews.text: Works great....used it on a snorkel trip and was very happy with it. You can go under water and if you try to breath it locks up and doesn't let water in. So if you accidentally go down too deep don't worry it won't pull water in....I used to hate the older snorkels that would chug water in if you go under by accident. Won't happen with this one. Happy with the product and value.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to breath in this mask
customer_reviews.text: Mask was all good except I felt like I was suffocating compared to my old mask. Just couldn’t get enough air circulating to use for more than a minute. Maybe there is a learning curve... I will keep trying. No instructions. Came with extra pieces I don’t see how to use. Tried looking it up on the internet. No help given.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Drowned
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our trip to Hawaii (we thought these would be an upgrade to our current full face masks we have used). They work for about 15 minutes and then you cannot breathe out of them. We finally had to take them off and then swim against the current while holding the masks. Frankly, THEY SUCK.
customer_reviews.author: SD Mar

customer_reviews.title: No recycled air just fresh breathing air that is why this unit caught my attention
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it winter in Canada you know. Only thing we have right now is our snow oranges are coming into season. But the mask I can't wait to use it is very comfortable once I shave my goatee it might work a little better. Fantastic looking unit with the two chamber breathing system no recycled air. What the fit feels good can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy,

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous snorkeling mask. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have snorkeled my entire life. I purchased this mask to upgrade as my last snorkel/mask purchase was 20 years ago. After numerous attempts for a fun and safe snorkel session using this product, I realized it’s a bad design and a complete waste of money. It leaks and fogs terrible and breathing is labor intensive....I would stick to the traditional mask/snorkel set up. 3 days into my 2 week Hawaii trip I spent $35 on a U.S. Diver mask/snorkel and it instantly made a huge difference. Don’t waste your money on this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wood

customer_reviews.title: Restricted air intake
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept of a full face mask with the GoPro mount, and it fit my face great - but the air intake seemed restricted, causing me to feel like I was suffocating. I removed two of the 4 flow control valves and the air intake was improved - but then fogging became an issue and also likely more CO2 re-circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to snorkel in Puerto Rico, but had to return
customer_reviews.text: My partner bought a cheaper version on Amazon that effectively does the same thing. I figured for the money and my lack of swimming skills I would buy the top-notch mask. However, more than a few times, the ball in the tube would get stuck and I would be gasping for air with my head under water far from the beach which was terrifying. I was pretty disappointed in this purchase overall because I would have like to have kept it and bragged that this mask was better and worth it, but unfortunately that was not the case and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Edsson

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: For years ive used more traditional snorkel setups. I borrowed a style similar to this one year and was hooked. After some research i settled on this brand and could not be happier. Fantastic masks for casual snorkeling. The obvious drawback is not being able to hold your nose or relieve pressure when diving.
customer_reviews.author: doug huskey

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: I am in Maui currently. I bought a mask for me (not this one) and one for my husband (this one). My other mask was terrible. This mask was way better. It was more expensive and worth it. It felt nice on, I didn't feel like I was suffocating like the cheap mask, and it did not continually fog up. I was able to adjust it to my face size and see turtles and fish with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K Sauer

customer_reviews.title: WildHon Seaview 180 V2 is it good?
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. The outer seal is perfect no water leaking, but the inner seal is leaking, whatever I adjusted the air leaked from the nose to the eye area so made it foggy. I tried toothpaste, anti foggy liquid but didn’t help. The GoPro bracket was hard to insert and remove from the mask, the strap didn’t hold and I kept adjusting it. The price is expensive. It looks nice on my face but doesn’t work for me. I has Head full face mask( made in Italy) which I bought in Costco works very good ( just $40).
customer_reviews.author: HIEP L.

customer_reviews.title: Improvement over prior
customer_reviews.text: Have used full face masks since the introduction many years ago and this is the first material improvement. Better airflow and less Co2 mixing makes for better endurance at least for me. The packaging and lens quality are excellent. First class product. Perfect for our reef exploration here on Maui.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorJohn

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of snorkel masks over the years including full-face ones. This one is by far the BEST. My good friend who is a master scuba diver even tried it. She was a huge fan so that says something. Just make sure you follow all the directions on how to get it sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a trip to Central America. My first impressions of the mask were great - every bit and accessory of the mask is high quality and very well built. I tested the mask in my pool before taking it overseas and testing it in the ocean. The mask surpassed my expectations! - I love that you can breathe without having to think about it - the peripheral vision on it is great - very comfortable All around highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Max A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Experience
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Two for my wife and myself and we both enjoyed using them . April of this year we went to curacao and used the masks almost every day.We found them to be very comfortable and no real adjustment required . We both feel just being able to breath normal and extra viewing area made it a great purchase. I am sure we will enjoy them for years to come ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with this. It’s very easy to put on and take off and fogs very little compared to a regular eyes/nose mask. At times the shutoff valve in the breathing tube can get stuck making it impossible to breath but easy slip off helps. Could be an issue with ocean diving though. I do enjoy using it though mostly because of how little it fogs up. It tends to press hard on my nose when diving to 10’ deep from the pressure
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Leaks with no way to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the thing. Because of the design, you can’t clear your mask. If it leaks, it’s trash. Mine leaks. Not water, but the mouth seal leaks. When I exhale, air shoots into my eyes. I adjusted it as tight as possible and it still leaks. Cool idea but a fail. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for large heads
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'5'' and was worried this mask would be too small like many others I tried, but it fit great. I wore this mask everyday for a few weeks snorkeling in Hawaii and was so happy with it. TIP: It only fogs up if you wear it lifted up on your head while not using it. So if you are not using it, just take it off completely.
customer_reviews.author: mashmash

customer_reviews.title: Better the V1 but still not there. More developmentis needed.
customer_reviews.text: I tried both versions and V2 still needs improvement. When I exhale the air is still fogging up the mask because air is escaping the lower month pocket. Even after tightening down the straps its never a air tight fit over the nose. I love this type of mask and will be holding out for Version 3. Hopefully V3 if it ever comes will finally work 100%
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant use on tours
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use while in Hawaii. Watched videos and reviews seemed like a great product. Got to Hawaii for snorkeling tour and they said these were not allowed because they were dangerous. I used in my pool before the trip and thought maybe I was just out of shape because I would start breathing hard after only a couple of minutes. As I have found out since the oxygen is depleted rather quickly and not replaced so I end up breathing the carbon dioxide. Great... now I have 4 of these and can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well designed
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use it in an area of the Winooski river (VT) near a waterfall with a big swimming hole (approx 12-15’ depth). It worked great! Got a good seal and had no leaks even with a chin beard. Visibility was very good, no fogging. Setup was very simple. Can’t wait to use this in Saint Croix
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Myself, my husband, and my adult son have all attempts to fit this on us and no matter how we adjust it and how well it seems to fit above the water, once under water there is a leak from the upper right side. It seems comfortable but with a leak it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fog up and air gets in your eyes no matter how tight, company non existent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium and a large because I wasn’t sure about the fit on the medium. With both I feel air on my eyes. Both fog up to the point of not being usable. Wildhorn has no way to contact them on their website and we’re going to Hawaii late next week so we’re not sure what to do now. We’ll be returning all three that we bought.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barenblat

customer_reviews.title: Great mask and snorkel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this full face snorkel mask to take on a 9-day southern Caribbean cruise. I've snorkeled for years but this was by far the best snorkeling experience. It was much more comfortable than the traditional mask and I learned that you can even dive down underwater and come up without any water in the snorkel. Much better views than the traditional mask. I would definitely recommend this product. Please note this one was more expensive than ones I have seen at Costco but possibly it's a better made product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not asking for a refund but
customer_reviews.text: Not asking for a refund but please be advised there is a very thin filter that cannot be replaced. When faulty, the mask fills up. We keep our mask in the shade and use it only in the pool and after a few months found it to be worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Tim arthur

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit unless your face is a perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the mask did not fit my face. I used the sizing chart correctly and ordered the large. It’s too small for my face. The issue is the molded rubber that is suppose to separate the mouth and nose chamber from your eye chamber. It’s made to fit a very specific face shape, and doesn’t seem too versatile if your face is not a perfect match. The mask looks good and seems simple, but I’ll have to return it. Based on other reviews I knew that this was a common problem with the mask so it wasn’t too surprising
customer_reviews.author: MAXX

customer_reviews.title: This full face snorkel mask made my summer vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got his full face snorkel mask, and in time! I had plans to go snorkeling while out in the islands but forgot I needed a mask, I always hate using the ones they provide me with as they are not of good quality. This one was on point, it made my trip, I ordered it 3 days before and boom it arrived a day later. The mask was amazing, in terms of comfort and durability. Its well worth the price, never worth it to go with a cheap product that will make your experience half of what it should be! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: This is for bigger noses.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely was designed for American/European noses. The nose bridge is too deep and didn't fit my Asian nose. This created a gap for carbon dioxide to escape to the eyes area and make it hard to breathe. Otherwise, this mask are well made from good materials.
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described good product just don’t use with sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Took on a recent cruise this is a good product but you cannot use it with sunscreen because I didn’t know that it was very slippery and didn’t seal good on my face had a not use sunscreen it would’ve worked just fine we took it on a recent cruise to the keys
customer_reviews.author: James W. Wahab

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel Mask - question safety
customer_reviews.text: Carbon dioxide seemed to build up in the face mask and made me light headed. I will not use in open water.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shellito

customer_reviews.title: Can’t breathe
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made quality mask. That’s where it ends! If you’re buying this to breathe with your face in the water forget it because you can’t get enough air. Buy the cheaper one. It works better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great field of view
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went to Bora Bora for our honeymoon and used the V2s to snorkel. They were great, we didn't have any leakage, no fogging of the lens, it does take a minute to get used to breathing, but once we adjusted we forgot we had them on and enjoyed the view. The main point about snorkeling is you don't want to constantly be thinking about your equipment, you just want something simple, easy to use, so you can enjoy the sights, this did it for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: This mask is simply the best one I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel mask is by far the best one on the market. I’ve tested multiple brands and designs and this one kills it. Crystal clear viewing, no leaks and easy to clear the spout. Highly recommend for any trip or free diving
customer_reviews.author: PolokingH2O

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for snorkeling!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask! Quality is on point. Does not fog. Keeps water out. Clear view underwater! Make sure you measure your face per the chart to get the right size. A lot of times when people have issues it’s because they don’t order the correct size
customer_reviews.author: Aftin

customer_reviews.title: Great Field of Vision
customer_reviews.text: The Seaview is really easy to use and provides a great field of vision. I've only been able to test it out in the pool so far but I'm looking forward to using it in the ocean soon. I get a slight bit of occasional leaking around the top but it just drains through the bottom and doesn't affect the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over older style separate  mask / tube combo.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to “talk” to others while snorkeling. Much better view than my old mask that covered eyes and nose, and easier to breath with than my mouth tube. Should have bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: joe dimauro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who hates snorkels and regulators. Took this to Aruba and we had a blast...my husband was finally comfortable snorkeling! If you just can't seem to handle breathing via snorkel, you are going to LOVE LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Haley

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than a normal snorkel set up.
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to try out my Seaview 2 and was thoroughly impressed. This is my first full face snorkel mask and was surprised at how easy the breathing was. My wife has always had difficulty with a regular snorkel set up. No problems with this at all. Everyone around us gave it a try and it received 100% thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Used at three beaches during vacation - clear sightline, no fogging up. Product true to advertising also love the sight line of the gopro mount - clipped on and due to positioning follows eye line - no missed photos or video due to positioning GREAT PRODUCT - WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE WHO SNORKELS
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel for beginners or experienced snorkelers
customer_reviews.text: This was so great on our Caribbean cruise and packed small enough to justify bringing along. No fogging, no seawater in my mouth at all, just set it and forget it. Made my wife like snorkeling when she didn't before. Easy, easy breathing, no restrictions at all.
customer_reviews.author: Reader25

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.text: Got this snorkel for an upcoming trip to Costa Rica. I made sure to follow the measurement chart in the pictures and the medium fits great! It's lightweight and provides a good field of vision. I'll update this review after I test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as well - lost it at sea
customer_reviews.text: To adjust its fit is not easy, doesnt seal correctly, so you get water inside - due to the lack of correct adjustment - in a wave, you can lose it - as I did
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Much better than some of the cheaper masks. Very comfortable, high air volume. Very nice! I've spend over an hour under water without coming up, great mask.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin T

customer_reviews.title: Improvement over the already great previous model
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love these masks. We all have the first generation masks and recently upgraded to the v2 mask. We use them to explore the lake at our camp and have not used them in any ocean diving. The mask is extremely comfortable and the new snorkel design is more visually appealing. Our guests at the lake are all intrigued by the mask and its design and are anxious to try it out. They have al enjoyed it. I couldn’t be happier with this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gordon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: We took our masks to St. Thomas and we were more than thrilled on how great it works. We had no problem at all with the masks. The clarity was absolutely stunning. I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Unable to form a seal
customer_reviews.text: I am one of the unfortunate few where this mask simply did not fit my face. I was not able to form a seal no matter how I muddled with the straps and face position: I ended up having to return the mask. Before the mask filled up, though, I was able to note how wide a view range I had from behind the mask. If the mask fits your face, then it will be a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Next-Gen Snorkel Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I got the opportunity to test out my new Seaview 180° in the pool yesterday. This is my first full-face snorkel mask. My first impressions...I love it! This is a next-gen design. Range of view. Check. Comfort. Check. Fully functional. Check. TIP: double check your size before ordering it. It makes a big difference on fit. Next, I'm stoked to take it on an upcoming trip to Kaua'i. My only reservation with a full-face mask is if water enters the mask in the open ocean...and not panic😳
customer_reviews.author: Andy Aston

customer_reviews.title: it's ok. get the measurement right
customer_reviews.text: sizing is difficult .. bought one bigger. leaked bought one smaller too small and tight but preferred that over the leaking. it did fog up after a few uses. but still better than any other we have had
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V.

customer_reviews.title: Best mask and snorkel technology ever!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is unbelievable! It fits perfectly and the clarity of the Mask itself is unbelievable. There's absolutely no Distortion Like you get with glass. I love how the snorkel snaps off for easy carrying and to prevent damage. It even has a built-in slot for my GoPro so I can film all kinds of shenanigans and creatures and fun without any difficulty whatsoever. The color is great and we even got cases to keep them in which are amazing all by themselves. I strongly recommend anyone who is looking for a snorkel and mask to try this one. Trust me- this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality full face snorkel
customer_reviews.text: This full face snorkel seems very well made! The second I opened it I could tell I got something that would last a long time. they have lots of cool colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Monty Stratton

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: Guys I've tried to go snorkeling before and just couldn't do it with the traditional mask (gag)! But this mask solves all of the problems you typically face! It is soo easy to breath in, and provides a completely unobstructed view! HIGHLY RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breathed only through my nose
customer_reviews.text: worked as advertised. I breathed only through my nose. I am a certified scuba diver. Recently I have been following the Buteyko Breathing Method (The Oxygen Advantage/ Patrick McKeown) and exclusively lightly breathing through my nose. The Wildhorn V2 mask provided an exceptional underwater experience. the fit could have been better around the bridge of my nose. but after a couple minutes in the water the fit felt okay. I snorkeled continuously for 20 minutes a number of times without taking the mask off with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Easy to breathe! Easy to see! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! I've tried taking my wife snorkeling so many times! She always feels claustrophobic and uncomfortable with the old snorkels and masks. This mask is the best thing ever! She doesn't need to worry about a million different parts! Breathing is natural and easy! And the shape of the mask is comfortable and easy to use! And you really can see 180 degrees so you don't feel claustrophobic. Thanks so much for making an amazing product! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Collette

customer_reviews.title: Fun mask
customer_reviews.text: This is our second mask, they are great for leisurely floating on top of water and looking down. Not meant for diving.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want to use it with a GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: The mask itself works nice. The face mask fits well and the mostly full view makes it worth it. The GoPro mount is flimsy tho and will break easily. I lost my GoPro due to this. Tried to contact seller directly and just got a will refund price of mask message. What about my GoPro ? It’s worth more than the mask, and I trusted the review and the mount and it easily broke. Either way the mask works well, but the mount is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little too big.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to snorkel on a cruise, but the mask was a little loo big for my face so it leaked. It seems high quality, I wish they had a "narrow face" option...
customer_reviews.author: E. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best full faced mask I have used
customer_reviews.text: Great view and comfortable used the v1 mask and many great improvements on this new v2 version. Only issue is very difficult to remove and clear fog when treading water a day trying to put back on... I do this all the time with a regular mask but very difficult to do with a full mask. Small issue with an otherwise awesome product..
customer_reviews.author: Luis Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Great mask but pay attention to the size guide!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on impulse as we live near the seaside but never explore what lives under the water. The mask is easy to fit and use for me, but size does seem to matter so sharing with my wife who has a much smaller head isn't that perfect and she finds it leaks. Breathing through the one way Valve is easy and natural after a few minutes and fitting the mask was super easy. The supplied go pro mount was an added bonus and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Allan

product_meta.title: WildHorn Outfitters Seaview 180° V2 Full Face Snorkel Mask with FLOWTECH Advanced Breathing System - Allows for A Natural & Safe Snorkeling Experience- Panoramic Side Snorkel Set Design
feature_bullets: FLOWTECH ADVANCED AIR INTAKE SYSTEM- Breathe naturally and comfortably through your nose and mouth. Flowtech has two chambers and 4 intake valves to allow air to circulate in and out freely. Using one-way valves and a separate breathing chamber ensures fresh air is always circulating through the mask. Flowtech provides 50 percent easier work of breathing compared to other full face snorkeling masks on the market. This combined with safe levels of CO2 make this the best full face snorkel mask

DESIGNED AND TESTED IN THE USA - The Seaview 180° V2 snorkeling mask was created by our team of experienced product designers and engineers. Through meticulous iteration we improved the airflow, visibility, fit, camera mount and safety of the full face snorkeling mask experience. The Seaview V2 launched on Kickstarter in 2018 and was backed by thousands of people. We used 3rd party experts to measure the airflow and CO2 elements of the mask to ensure a safe user experience for all.

IMPORTANT SIZING TIPS- Full face snorkel mask adult sizing is important to get right. Be sure to measure from the bridge of your nose (between your eyes) to the tip of your chin. Measure along the side of your nose, not over the top. Follow the sizing chart. If you are in between sizes, it's usually best to select the smaller size. For the best seal, you may need to tweak the placement of the mask on your face until you have the most comfortable fit. Be sure to test in a pool before your trip.

ENHANCED FEATURES- The patent pending angled tube design allows for less restricted, two-way airflow. The angled snorkel tube stays above water more easily and gives your head more freedom of movement. The viewing area is 20 percent larger to give you more visibility. The camera mount now swivels and is located near the chin to stay under water more easily. The ergonomics and fit are much improved. Lastly, the additional one-way valves and separate breathing chamber help to reduce fogging.

PROPER USE- Full face snorkel masks are designed for leisure surface snorkeling. Serious freediving is not recommended because you cannot equalize. Strenuous swimming while wearing any type of snorkel, including full face designs, is not recommended. A strenuous swim requires friction-less breathing. Be sure to take regular breaks while snorkeling. Also follow the buddy rule: never snorkel alone. Become familiar with your gear before you go. Try it in a pool and make sure it fits and seals.
